mapper.sql: huid, rname, sex, phone, huname, email, create_time, oid, oname, password
mapper.insert: insert into huser (huid, rname, sex, phone, huname, email, create_time, oid, oname, password) values (#{huid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{huname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update huser
rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR},
huname = #{huname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
oname = #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where huid = #{huid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update huser set rname = #{rname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=CHAR}, huname = #{huname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, oid = #{oid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, oname = #{oname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where huid = #{huid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select * from huser order by create_time desc
